Name: Rising Noracam
About the game: Climb the ruins in a hand drawn world, to obtain the legendary treasure that is at the top The movements are just walk and jump(+something). But one mistake can cause you to fall straight away Overcome the fear and despair of falling and reach the top On the way there will be a lot of nice music (can be turned off) -Prologue- Noracam, a novice treasure hunter, heads to a certain ruin in search of treasure. Had understood that it is a safe place without dangerous creatures ... -About the controls- It can be operated with the mouse, keyboard or controller. Just move and jump. The jump height changes depending on how long you press the button, and you will not be able to move if you jump without running And be careful, if you hit your head while jumping you will have a knokback
